Absolutely nothing but the prisoner enters the prison. The prison supplies everything the prisoner needs.
All communication with visitors will be via solid partition. Absolutely no contact with visitors.
All communication to or from the outside is unencrypted electronic.

Anything the prisoner wants (like books with big words and no pictures) is ordered via the prison commissary. They will deduct funds from the prisoners account and place the order with the supplier. No prisoner name will be associated with the outside order. Everything will be shipped to the prison, inspected, and only then given to the prisoner.
